text: Hassan Mawla Maleh ( , born 1 July 1963) is a coach and former Iraqi football player.The recollection of football stars (in Arabic) Since 2012, Mawla works as the director of the Basra Specialized Spherical SchoolInterview with the director of the Basra Specialized Spherical School (in Arabic), and he is also currently a board of directors member in Al-Minaa club. ==Honors== ===Local=== ;Al-Quwa Al-Jawiya * Iraqi League **Winners (1): 1991–92. * Iraq FA Cup: **Winners (1): 1991–92. * Iraqi Elite Cup: **Runners-up (1): 1991. ;Al-Bahri * Iraq Division One: **Runners-up (2): 1983–84 ; 1996–97. ;Al-Ittihad * Iraq Division One: **Winners (1): 1980–81. **Runners-up (1): 1977–78. ==References== ==External links== *Hassan Mawla page on kooora.com *Interview with the coach Mawla in 2012 on al-nnas.com *Al-Minaa Club: Sailors of south Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Iraqi footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Al-Bahri players Category:Al- Quwa Al-Jawiya players Category:Al-Mina'a SC players Category:Sportspeople from Basra Category:Iraqi football managers Category:Al-Mina'a SC managers
title: Hassan Mawla
